content: **knitted hat for men in 1 strand drops nepal or 2 strands drops nord the piece is worked in stocking stitch with ribbed brim ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ne-381 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150 g colour 8914 red clay or use drops nord from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150 g colour 21 brick red **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand drops nepal or 2 strands drops nord = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
